# og-radio-button-group



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                        | Type      | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | -------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | Determines, whether the control is disabled or not | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `name`     | `name`     | name for the radio buttons within this group       | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `value`    | `value`    | The value of the selected radio button.            | `string`  | `undefined` |


## Events

| Event          | Description | Type                  |
| -------------- | ----------- | --------------------- |
| `valueChanged` |             | `CustomEvent<string>` |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                                           | Description                                                  |
| ---------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------ |
| `--og-radio-button-Background`                 | Background of the radio button (shorthand)                   |
| `--og-radio-button-Background--checked`        | Background of the radio button when checked (shorthand)      |
| `--og-radio-button-Background--disabled`       | Background of the radio button when disabled (shorthand)     |
| `--og-radio-button-Background--hover`          | Background of the radio button when hovered (shorthand)      |
| `--og-radio-button-BorderColor`                | Border color of the radio button                             |
| `--og-radio-button-BorderColor--checked`       | Border color of the radio button when checked                |
| `--og-radio-button-BorderColor--hover`         | Border color of the radio button when hovered                |
| `--og-radio-button-BorderRadius`               | Border radius of the radio button                            |
| `--og-radio-button-BorderWidth`                | Border width of the radio button                             |
| `--og-radio-button-Height`                     | Height of the radio button (box model: border-box)           |
| `--og-radio-button-Width`                      | Width of the radio button (box model: border-box)            |
| `--og-radio-button__icon-Background`           | Background of the radio button icon (shorthand)              |
| `--og-radio-button__icon-Background--checked`  | Background of the radio button icon when checked (shorthand) |
| `--og-radio-button__icon-Background--hover`    | Background of the radio button icon when hovered (shorthand) |
| `--og-radio-button__icon-BorderColor`          | Border color of the radio button icon                        |
| `--og-radio-button__icon-BorderColor--checked` | Border color of the radio button icon when checked           |
| `--og-radio-button__icon-BorderColor--hover`   | Border color of the radio button icon when hovered           |
| `--og-radio-button__icon-BorderRadius`         | Border radius of the radio button icon                       |
| `--og-radio-button__icon-BorderWidth`          | Border width of the radio button icon                        |
| `--og-radio-button__icon-Height`               | Height of the radio button icon                              |
| `--og-radio-button__icon-Left`                 | Left position of the radio button icon                       |
| `--og-radio-button__icon-Top`                  | Top position of the radio button icon                        |
| `--og-radio-button__icon-Width`                | Width of the radio button icon                               |
